apiClassifier.shortdesc: Represents a physics body, typically attached to a Being.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Represents a physics body, typically attached to a Being.

apiConstructor.shortdesc: Constructor - internal usage only - do not call this method directly.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Being that owns this Body.

apiConstructorDetail.apiDesc: Constructor - internal usage only - do not call this method directly.

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the position of this Body.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Returns the position of this Body. Modifying the x or y values of the result will not affect this Body, use moveTo() instead.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Used to bind a native b2Body to a Sentinel Body and an owner.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Used to bind a native b2Body to a Sentinel Body and an owner.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Result data obtained from using a query method on a physics Engine instance.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Result data obtained from using a query method on a physics Engine instance.

apiParam.apiDesc: The Fixture of interest for this result.
The point of interest for this result. In a queryLine() call, this will be the point of intersection.
A secondary point of interest. In a queryLine() call, this will be the normal.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines and encapsulates debug drawing for Box2D.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Defines and encapsulates debug drawing for Box2D.

apiParam.apiDesc: A reference to the core Game class.
List of drawing flags. If null or empty, B2Debug.SHAPE will be used.

apiValue.shortdesc: The native Sprite used to render the debug graphics.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The native Sprite used to render the debug graphics.

apiValue.shortdesc: The wrapper Sprite used for rendering debug graphics.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The wrapper Sprite used for rendering debug graphics.

apiParam.apiDesc: Gravity values for the physics world. Defaults to zero gravity.
Whether or not the world will attempt to put objects to sleep.
The number of iterations used to smooth out velocities. Higher values are slower but give more accurate results.
The number of iterations used to smooth out positions. Higher values are slower by give more accurate results.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates a new Body within this physics engine.

apiParam.apiDesc: The owner of the resulting Body.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a new Body within this physics engine.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Cast a line through the world and return a list of EngineQueryResults containing data about each intersection made.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Cast a line through the world and return a list of EngineQueryResults containing data about each intersection made.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Query the world for Fixtures who overlap a given point and return a list of EngineQueryResults associated with those Fixtures.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Query the world for Fixtures who overlap a given point and return a list of EngineQueryResults associated with those Fixtures.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Query the world for Fixtures who overlap a provided Shape and return a list of EngineQueryResults associated with those Fixtures.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Query the world for Fixtures who overlap a provided Shape and return a list of EngineQueryResults associated with those Fixtures.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Run one step of calculations within the physics world.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Run one step of calculations within the physics world. Should be called each time the game World updates.

apiValue.shortdesc: Iterate over the list of bodies contained within this physics world and returns them as a Vector<Body>.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Iterate over the list of bodies contained within this physics world and returns them as a Vector<Body>.

apiValue.shortdesc: The Debug instance used by this engine, if any.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The Debug instance used by this engine, if any.

apiValue.shortdesc: Whether or not this engine is in debug mode.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Whether or not this engine is in debug mode.

apiValue.shortdesc: The gravity applies to bodies within the engine.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The gravity applies to bodies within the engine.

apiValue.shortdesc: The pixel to metre scaling ratio.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The pixel to metre scaling ratio.

apiValue.shortdesc: Whether or not the engine puts bodies to sleep.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Whether or not the engine puts bodies to sleep.

apiValue.shortdesc: The total number of bodies being managed by this engine.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The total number of bodies being managed by this engine.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Defines a shape used by a Fixture.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Defines a shape used by a Fixture.

asCustoms.csharp: I'll be glad to not have to mess around with Vector2D -> Point -> Vector2D conversions.

apiParam.apiDesc: The vector value along the x axis.
The vector value along the y axis.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns a new Vector2D whose x and y values are a given angle and distance from this Vector2D.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns a new Vector2D whose x and y values are a given angle and distance from this Vector2D.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Creates a Vector2D whose x and y values represent a given direction.

apiParam.apiDesc: The distance along the given direction angle.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Creates a Vector2D whose x and y values represent a given direction.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Loads the values of a simple representation of a Vector2D into this Vector2D.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Loads the values of a simple representation of a Vector2D into this Vector2D.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Saves a simple representation of this Vector2D.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Saves a simple representation of this Vector2D.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Simultaneously assing new x and y values to this Vector2D.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Simultaneously assing new x and y values to this Vector2D.
